title: Build a Centered Card
description: Create a card component that is centered on the page with a shadow and rounded corners.
instructions:
Create a card with:
- Width of 400px
- Centered horizontally and vertically
- Padding of 30px
- Border radius of 10px
- Box shadow
- A heading 'Welcome' and a paragraph of text

expectedSolution.html:
Welcome

This is a centered card component with beautiful styling.

title: Interactive Button with Hover
description: Create a button that changes color on hover and shows an alert when clicked.
instructions:
Create a button with:
- Text 'Click Me'
- Blue background (#3b82f6)
- White text
- Padding: 12px 24px
- Border radius: 6px
- Changes to darker blue on hover
- Shows alert 'Button clicked!' on click

title: Responsive Navigation Bar
description: Build a horizontal navigation bar with multiple links and proper styling.
instructions:
Create a navigation bar with:
- Fixed at top
- Background color #1f2937
- Contains 4 links: Home, About, Services, Contact
- Links are white and evenly spaced
- Links change color to #60a5fa on hover
- Padding: 20px
- Use flexbox for layout

expectedSolution.html:
Home About Services Contact

Welcome to our website

title: Simple Form with Validation
description: Create a form with email validation and submit handling.
instructions:
Create a form with:
- Email input field
- Submit button
- On submit, validate email is not empty
- Show success message 'Form submitted!' in green if valid
- Show error message 'Please enter an email' in red if empty
- Prevent default form submission
- Style the form with proper spacing and colors

title: Responsive Navigation Bar with Dropdown Menus
description:
Create a fully responsive navigation bar that stays fixed at the top of the viewport. The navigation bar should contain four main links: Home, About, Services, and Contact. The Services link should have a dropdown submenu with at least three submenu items. On desktop screens, the submenu should appear on hover, while on mobile screens, the submenu should open/close when the Services link is clicked.

The navigation bar should use flexbox for layout, have a consistent color scheme, and provide a smooth user experience on both desktop and mobile devices. The bar must be accessible, keyboard-navigable, and visually appealing.
instructions:
Create a fixed navigation bar at the top of the page with the specified links.

Use flexbox to evenly space the navigation links horizontally.

Implement a dropdown submenu under the Services link with at least three items.

On desktop screens, the submenu appears on hover.

On mobile screens (width ??? 768px), implement a toggle for opening/closing the submenu when the Services link is clicked.

Style the navbar with background color #1f2937, white text, and a hover color #60a5fa.

Ensure the navigation bar is keyboard accessible (tab navigation and submenu accessible via keyboard).

The navbar and dropdown must be responsive and look good on different screen sizes.

Provide smooth transitions for submenu appearance/disappearance.

Bonus: Add an accessible "hamburger" menu on mobile that toggles the entire navigation links.
